(25198, 28142).description: Uncontrolled fires that can damage or destroy heritage sites and coastal areas

(25198, 28142).name: river floods
(25198, 28142).label: natural hazard
(25198, 28142).description: The overflow of rivers that can cause damage or destruction to coastal areas and heritage sites

(25198, 28142).name: earthquakes
(25198, 28142).label: natural hazard
(25198, 28142).description: Seismic events that can cause damage or destruction to coastal areas and heritage sites

(27673, 30687).name: AHS
(27673, 30687).label: project
(27673, 30687).description: A project focused on assessing the exposure of African Heritage Sites to coastal hazards and climate change

(27673, 30687).name: natural hazards
(27673, 30687).label: natural hazard
(27673, 30687).description: Phenomena with the potential to cause significant harm to life, property, and the environment, such as fires, river floods, and earthquakes

(27673, 30687).name: coastal hazard
(27673, 30687).label: natural hazard
(27673, 30687).description: Hazards that occur in coastal areas, including flooding, erosion, and saltwater intrusion

(27673, 30687).name: GLO-90
(27673, 30687).label: dataset
(27673, 30687).description: A digital elevation model dataset published by the European Union's Earth observation programme, used to assess coastal hazard exposure

(27673, 30687).name: European Union's Earth observation programme
(27673, 30687).label: provider
(27673, 30687).description: An organization that provides Earth observation data and services, including the GLO-90 dataset

(27673, 30687).name: X-band radar
(27673, 30687).label: instrument
(27673, 30687).description: A type of radar technology used to collect elevation data for digital elevation models

(27673, 30687).name: Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM)
(27673, 30687).label: project
(27673, 30687).description: A NASA mission that collected elevation data for the creation of digital elevation models

(27673, 30687).name: salinity
(27673, 30687).label: variable
(27673, 30687).description: The concentration of dissolved salts in water, which can affect the integrity of African Heritage Sites

(27673, 30687).name: inundation
(27673, 30687).label: variable
(27673, 30687).description: The flooding of land with water, which can be caused by coastal hazards such as sea level rise and storms

(30196, 33337).name: Kenya
(30196, 33337).label: location
(30196, 33337).description: A country in East Africa, with a coastline along the Indian Ocean

(30196, 33337).name: Joint Research Centre
(30196, 33337).label: provider
(30196, 33337).description: A research institution of the European Commission, focused on scientific and technological development

(30196, 33337).name: European Commission
(30196, 33337).label: provider
(30196, 33337).description: The executive arm of the European Union, responsible for proposing and implementing EU policies

(30196, 33337).name: inundation
(30196, 33337).label: natural hazard
(30196, 33337).description: The flooding of land with water, often caused by coastal erosion, sea-level rise, or extreme weather events

(30196, 33337).name: salinity
(30196, 33337).label: variable
(30196, 33337).description: The concentration of dissolved salts in water, an important factor in coastal ecosystems and hazards

(30196, 33337).name: subsidence
(30196, 33337).label: natural hazard
(30196, 33337).description: The sinking or settling of the ground surface, often caused by human activities such as groundwater extraction

(30196, 33337).name: coastal erosion
(30196, 33337).label: natural hazard
(30196, 33337).description: The wearing away of the coastline by natural forces such as waves, tides, and currents

(30196, 33337).name: coastal flooding
(30196, 33337).label: natural hazard
(30196, 33337).description: The flooding of coastal areas, often caused by storms, sea-level rise, or coastal erosion
